title: Can You Handle My Talking Tom 2? NEW GAME APP (Official Trailer #2)
description:
Get the new game, My Talking Tom 2, on Android and iOS! Talking Tom needs your help – just see for yourself in this game trailer!  

From basketball and a punching bag to a trampoline and a swing, Tom has loads of awesome new toys! It’s one of the best mobile games around! But Tom needs you to come to play with him! You can pick him up, make him jump, and help him dunk a basket. Gaming with Tom is so much fun. You can even go flying together! 

But don't throw Tom around too much or he might get a little boo-boo… If that happens, just put your doctor hat on and find the perfect cure in his medicine cabinet! See how in this game trailer! 

And don't forget to give Tom his favorite snacks and wash him before bedtime! The gameplay is awesome! 

Are you ready to take the gaming fun to the next level? We’ve already got the best mobile games on Android and iOS. All we need is YOU! Tune in for a cool game trailer here, epic gameplay there… And let the awesomeness begin! 

#gaming #gameplay #gametrailer

My Talking Tom 2 is free, family-friendly fun. Download it now and join millions of Tom’s fans all around the world! Available on Android and iOS.

https://outfit7.com/apps/download/mtt2-yt-description

Produced by Lunar Animation: http://www.lunaranimation.com/

Subscribe to my YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/TalkingTomCat?sub_confirmation=1
